## 01 - basic ggplot

```{r}
#install.packages("palmerpenguins")
#library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) + 
  geom_point()
```

## 02 - palmerpenguins

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
ggplot(penguins, aes(bill_length_mm, flipper_length_mm, colour = species)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
glimpse(penguins)
```
